name: gatewayaction
description: Executes a specifc action for a gateway instance.

params.name: gatewayID
params.description: Identifier of the gateway to do the action on.

params.name: action
params.description: action to execute, possible values are [start,stop and restart]

params.name: waitForIt
params.description: Wait for the process to end (starting, stopping or restarting)

params.name: timeout
params.description: in case `waitForIt` is set to `true`, this defines how long we wait for the process to end, default is one second.
